name: The Sound Pipe Media
tagline: Specialist Social Networking App Agency London
description:
The Sound Pipe Media started creating apps over 6 years ago. We firstly started creating apps for the Luxury industry working with clients such as Sunseeker Yachts, Gentings Casino, Celtic Football Club, Viation and many others. 
As the industry evolved The Sound Pipe Media have started working with a lot of startups & entreprenuers. We now specialise in Social Networking Apps both for iOS/Android. Most of our portfolio now is working within the Social Networking space & ecommerce Social Networking. Apps similar to Uber, WhatsApp, Tinder, Pininterest, Instagram & Facebook. 
So if your looking for the next biggest Social App then get in touch.
